message.content:
cs.DB, cs.DS, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses the technique issues when leveraging existing infrastructure of relational database (RDB) in the graph data management, which falls under the category of database systems (cs.DB). The paper also focuses on shortest path discovery, which is a fundamental problem in graph theory and falls under the category of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). The paper proposes optimization strategies specific to shortest path discovery, which involves search algorithms and heuristics, falling under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the use of window functions and merge statements, which are features of SQL standards, falling under the category of information retrieval (cs.IR) and database systems (cs.DB). Finally, the paper discusses the performance and scalability of the proposed approach, which falls under the category of systems and infrastructure (cs.SI).
